mapper.select: select ans.id,ans.answer_ctnt,ans.user_id,ans.question_id,ans.good,user.username,user.imageurl,qus.question_text,qus.comment_num FROM answer ans INNER JOIN question qus ON ans.question_id = qus.id INNER JOIN user ON ans.user_id = user.id

select ans.id,ans.answer_ctnt,ans.user_id,ans.question_id,ans.good,user.username,user.imageurl,qus.question_text,qus.comment_num FROM answer ans INNER JOIN question qus ON ans.question_id = qus.id INNER JOIN user ON ans.user_id = user.id INNER JOIN followque fq ON fq.question_id = qus.id WHERE fq.user_id = #{user_id}

select ans.id,ans.answer_ctnt,ans.user_id,ans.question_id,ans.good,user.username,user.imageurl,qus.question_text,qus.comment_num FROM answer ans INNER JOIN question qus ON ans.question_id = qus.id INNER JOIN user ON ans.user_id = user.id WHERE ans.good > 5000 OR qus.comment_num > 100

select ans.id,ans.answer_ctnt,ans.user_id,ans.question_id,ans.good,user.username,user.imageurl,qus.question_text,qus.comment_num FROM answer ans INNER JOIN question qus ON ans.question_id = qus.id INNER JOIN user ON ans.user_id = user.id INNER JOIN collect col ON col.answer_id = ans.id WHERE col.user_id = #{user_id}

select ans.id,ans.answer_ctnt,ans.user_id,ans.question_id,ans.good,ans.answer_comment,ans.answer_time,qus.question_text,user.username,user.imageurl FROM answer ans INNER JOIN question qus ON ans.question_id = qus.id INNER JOIN user ON ans.user_id = user.id WHERE ans.question_id = #{question_id}

select ans.id,ans.answer_ctnt,ans.user_id,ans.question_id,ans.good,ans.answer_comment,ans.answer_time,qus.question_text,user.username,user.imageurl,user.describe FROM answer ans INNER JOIN question qus ON ans.question_id = qus.id INNER JOIN user ON ans.user_id = user.id WHERE ans.id = #{answer_id}
